articles.title: Apple to Analyze User Data on Devices to Bolster AI Technology - Bloomberg
articles.description: Apple Inc. will begin analyzing data on customers’ devices in a bid to improve its artificial intelligence platform, a move designed to safeguard user information while still helping it catch up with AI rivals.
